information: The maximum number of points is 15. Those are the cross-code-review and cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: 3 routes (main and 2 routes for forms), Redux is set up and used to collect data from both forms, redirect to main route after submitting the form
Validation works for both forms according to the requirements (error messages, blocking submit button), Yup is used for validation (10 points if works only for one form)
Name, age, email, gender picker, accept T&C are implemented for both forms and collect data (if something doesn't work, the score can be less)
Input for image is implemented for both forms, the image is saved as base64 and displayed on the main route after redirect
Passwords (with password strength) are implemented for both forms
Usage of component libraries, e.g. Material UI, Ant Design
Presence of code-smells (God-object, chunks of duplicate code), commented code sections
Pull Request doesn't follow guideline (including checkboxes in Score)
